name: Flein
description:
Description

Find the psilocybins hiding among the grass and experience what they have to offer. Jam theme was "keep it simple", so there's no UI and there's only one objective; eat.

Seizure warning: game gets visually very intense towards the end

Details
  • Play time: 10-15 min
  • Music by Siddharta Corsus
Controls
  • Press F to go full screen.
  • WASD - movement
  • Left Mouse Button - pick mushrooms
  • Shift - sprint
  • CTRL - crouch
  • Space - jump
  • Escape - pause/exit
